articles.title: Texas summer camp shooter couldn't own gun, but stole wife's
articles.description: The shooter's wife says he took her gun from a locked safe, highlighting the difficulties of keeping firearms away from those who shouldn't have them.

articles.title: Housing crisis: Investor demand slows as mortgage rates surpass 6%
articles.description: Americans who don't already own a home are about to fork out more for a mortgage, and even renters will suffer as demand for leases goes up.
articles.content: The average U.S. fixed interest rate for a 30-year mortgage rose above 6% this week. It's more than double the 2.98% borrowers were offered during the same time period in 2021. Spurred on by the Fede… [+3785 chars]

articles.title: Gas station manager says he was fired for setting 69-cent price via decimal error
articles.description: The Shell gas station manager mistakenly moved a decimal, setting prices at 69 cents per gallon instead of $6.99. Gas hasn't been that cheap since 1978.
